properties.publicRemarks: Enjoy resort-style living at Monterey Country Club! This beautifully remodeled 2BD/2BA + Den home boasts one of the best panoramic views of the mountains, fairway, and golf course. The open-concept layout features high ceilings, recessed lighting, a converted atrium dining area, and a stunning library. The upgraded kitchen includes a large island, custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and a picture window with motorized shade. Both bedrooms are en-suite with walk-in showers and stylish finishes. The den includes a sofa sleeper for guests. Relax or entertain on the extended, enclosed patio while soaking in the gorgeous desert sunsets. Newer A/C and water heater. Don't miss this upgraded gem!

properties.publicRemarks: Stunning is the best word to describe this one of a kind home. The epitome of desert elegance - 23 Emerald Court located in the highly desirable Revelle at Clancy Lane in Rancho Mirage. This exquisite home offers a seamless blend of modern sophistication and serene desert charm. With 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, the open-concept design is perfect for both entertaining and everyday living. The spacious living areas are flooded with natural light, highlighting the gorgeous high-end finishes and custom details throughout. The chef's kitchen is a dream, featuring Wolf, Sub-Zero and Asko appliances, while the expansive living room offers panoramic views of the lush, private yard and the surrounding desert landscape with stunning mountain views. Step outside to your own personal oasis with a beautiful negative edge pool & spa, perfect for enjoying the incredible year-round weather. Custom designed interior hardwired roller shades in the living room and great room in addition to floor to ceiling motorized exterior screens. Located just minutes from world-class golf courses, shopping, fine dining, and entertainment, this home offers the best of Rancho Mirage living in an exclusive, tranquil setting. Come experience the luxury and lifestyle that awaits at 23 Emerald Court. Schedule your private showing today!

properties.publicRemarks: This charming triplex is located in the great city of Palm Desert by the Civic Center Park and off of Fred Waring. This property is approximately 1,957 Sq..Ft. One unit has 2 bed/1 bath, another unit has 1 bed/1 bath, and the last unit is a studio. All units have a parking space, an electrical meter, and gas stoves. 2 Units have a mini split, and the other has a window A/C. The roof and windows are two years old. The owner spent over $60,000 on updating the units. This property's proximity to the desert amenities is not only convenient, but also perfect for desert living: it is near public and private schools as well as the College of the Desert, driving range, restaurants, and shopping areas along El Paseo and HWY 111. This property is ideal for an investment opportunity in the great desert. All of the units are currently occupied. SELLER MAY CARRY. Please DO NOT DISTURB TENANTS. FULLY OCCUPY. Call for more details.

properties.publicRemarks:
Desert Oasis in Rancho Mirage!
If privacy is your desire, this home provides that and much more! This lushly landscaped 3-bedroom, 3-bath gem is ready and waiting for you to make your very own! A spacious Broadmoor floor plan features two primary suites and generous storage throughout. Just steps away, you can relax by a sparkling community pool while enjoying the southern mountain views. Located in the heart of Rancho Mirage, you'll be just minutes from upscale dining, shopping, and the local art scene.
Enjoy resort-style living in the gated community of The Springs. This active community offers an 18-hole championship golf course, pickleball, tennis, bocce, fitness center, and a stunning clubhouse with year-round social events and activities. 
Luxury, convenience, and vibrant desert living all in one! Come take a look today!!
The Springs is where you belong!

properties.publicRemarks: This fully remodeled condo is the perfect choice for your short-term or long-term stay. Experience the comfort and convenience of this exceptional property, featuring new tile flooring, spacious living room with an electric fireplace, HD TV, and high-speed Internet with Wi-Fi. The sectional sofa in the living room also doubles as a sleeper for additional guests. The updated kitchen boasts modern appliances and is fully equipped for all your culinary needs. The master bedroom offers a newly updated king-size bed, while the second bedroom features a newly updated queen-size bed. The third bedroom, currently used as a den, includes a full-size sofa bed and a bar area. With a large patio featuring a built-in barbecue grill and a backyard that resembles your own private park, outdoor entertainment options abound. Additional highlights include a huge 2-car garage with storage space. Please note the following availability and rental details: Summer Rental: From 6/1/2025 to 10/31/2025 at $3,000/month (or best offer)  Don't miss this opportunity to enjoy the luxurious amenities and comfortable living offered by this remodeled condo in Sunrise Country Club. Contact us now to secure your stay and experience the finest in resort-style living.

properties.publicRemarks: Welcome to 39810 Bedford Drive, a beautifully appointed 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom condominium located in the serene, gated community of Wilshire Palms in Rancho Mirage. Spanning 1,922 square feet, this single-level home is offered fully furnished and is available for immediate occupancy on a one-year lease. Step inside to discover a spacious great room featuring vaulted ceilings and travertine flooring, creating an inviting atmosphere for relaxation and entertaining. The kitchen is equipped with granite countertops, cherry wood cabinetry, a breakfast bar, and a dining area, perfect for culinary enthusiasts. Both the great room and the primary suite open to a private patio overlooking lush greenbelts, providing a tranquil outdoor retreat. Residents of Wilshire Palms enjoy access to six swimming pools and spas, lighted tennis and pickleball courts, and beautifully maintained grounds. The community is conveniently located near premier shopping, dining, and entertainment venues, including The River, El Paseo, and the McCallum Theatre. Eisenhower Medical Center is just minutes away, and Palm Springs International Airport is a short 20-minute drive. Don't miss this opportunity to lease a fully furnished home in one of Rancho Mirage's most desirable communities. Contact us today to schedule a private showing.

properties.publicRemarks: 3BR/2BA main home and separate casita with full kitchen and bath, surrounding a pool and spa * Property is a cosmetic fixer with a fair amount of deferred maintenance; great opportunity for investors or end users getting into the market at a great price and making the property their own  * Open kitchen/dining area with direct access to the pool deck * Large formal living room * This west facing home gets wonderful natural light * Primary bedroom with ensuite bath and direct access through sliding glass doors to a covered patio and pool deck * 2 additional nice sized bedrooms and 2nd hall bath * Separate casita with full kitchen and bath * Fresh interior paint * 2-car attached garage * Fantastic Palm Desert location! Walking distance to the shops and restaurants in the Waring Plaza and the Desert Crossing shopping malls as well as College of the Desert.
